## impulseT variable

Creates a new impulse gen, producing a single `on` for the first invocation of [IGen.next()](./dsp.igen.next.md)<!-- -->, then only `off` thereafter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
impulseT: <T>(on: T, off: T) => Impulse<T>
```
